name: point-cloud-labeler
description: Interactive point cloud labeling tool for LiDAR data

scripts.build:cmake: cd native/pcd_parser && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DBUILD_TESTS=OFF .. && make
scripts.build:copy: cp native/pcd_parser/build/*.dylib build/Release/ 2>/dev/null || cp native/pcd_parser/build/*.so build/Release/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:cmake && npm run build:node && npm run build:copy && npm run build:fixrpath
scripts.test: cd native/pcd_parser && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DBUILD_TESTS=ON .. && make && ctest --output-on-failure
